include/ulib/base/suvreq.h

00001 /*

00010    without even the implied warranty of merchantability or fitness
00011    for a particular purpose. The author and his publisher are not
00012    responsible for any damages, direct or incidental, resulting
00013    from the use or non-use of these Example Files.

00016    coding mistakes that were included for educational reasons.

00020 
00021 #ifndef _SUVREQ_H_
00022 #define _SUVREQ_H_ 1
00023 /*
00024    Header to request specific standard support. Before including it, one
00025    of the following symbols must be defined (1003.1-1988 isn't supported):
00026 
00027       SUV_POSIX1990  for 1003.1-1990
00028       SUV_POSIX1993  for 1003.1b-1993 - real-time
00029       SUV_POSIX1996  for 1003.1-1996
00030       SUV_SUS1       for Single UNIX Specification, v. 1 (UNIX 95)
00031       SUV_SUS2       for Single UNIX Specification, v. 2 (UNIX 98)
00032       SUV_SUS3       for Single UNIX Specification, v. 3
00033 */
00034 
00035 #ifdef _POSIX_SOURCE
00036 #  error "_POSIX_SOURCE defined"
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #if defined(SUV_POSIX1990)
00040 #  define _POSIX_SOURCE
00041 #  define _POSIX_C_SOURCE 1
00042 #elif defined(SUV_POSIX1993)
00043 #  define _POSIX_SOURCE
00044 #  define _POSIX_C_SOURCE 199309L
00045 #elif defined(SUV_POSIX1996)
00046 #  define _POSIX_SOURCE
00047 #  define _POSIX_C_SOURCE 199506L
00048 #elif defined(SUV_SUS1)
00049 #  define _POSIX_SOURCE
00050 #  define _POSIX_C_SOURCE 2
00051 #  define _XOPEN_SOURCE
00052 #  define _XOPEN_SOURCE_EXTENDED 1
00053 #elif defined(SUV_SUS2)
00054 #  define _POSIX_SOURCE
00055 #  define _POSIX_C_SOURCE 199506L
00056 #  define _XOPEN_SOURCE 500
00057 #  define _XOPEN_SOURCE_EXTENDED 1
00058 #elif defined(SUV_SUS3)
00059 #  define _POSIX_SOURCE
00060 #  define _POSIX_C_SOURCE 200112L
00061 #  define _XOPEN_SOURCE 600
00062 #  define _XOPEN_SOURCE_EXTENDED 1
00063 #endif
00064 
00065 #endif
Generated on Fri Apr 9 19:02:01 2010 for ULib C++ Library by  1.6.3
